department.dept_long_name: Department of East Asian Languages and Civilizations

course.title: Supervised Reading and Research
course.faculty_text: James Robson and members of the Department
course.description: Independent reading and research in East Asian Studies.
course.notes: Open to students who have given evidence of ability to do independent reading and research. May be taken on an individual basis or by small groups of students interested in working on the same topic. Permission of the Director of Undergraduate Studies required.
